message: Let's start fair. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor. This way, we both get a good share.
Your offer was a bit too much in your favor, Alice. Let's be fair, I'll take the 60/40 split this time.
Okay, I'll adjust my offer slightly.  Let's split it 55/45.  This is a fair compromise, and we can avoid further rounds of inflation.
